354890.name: Rustbucket Rumble Debut Character Pack
354890.description:
Permanently unlocks all six debut robots for use in all modes of gameplay. The six robots are:
  • Clancy, Grunt Model CLN-C - A combat generalist with an assault rifle
  • Daisy, Engineer Model QT-3.14 - A power-suit wearing engineer with roller bombs
  • Bjorn, Brute Model HPM4X - A defensive hulk with a flamethrower
  • Kasumi, Ninja Model KA5-M13 - A ninja assassin with a deadly cyber-sword
  • Maverick, Bombardier Model DNGR-ZON - A rocket launcher wielding robot with a jetpack
  • Valentina, Sniper Model H0RN3T - A western robot with a sniper rifle
354890.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
